QuestData.Title: Hot Lava
QuestData.Description: <The massive earth elemental gazes down upon you.>$B$BThe flow of the lava must be stopped if we are to prevail. I will grant to you a portion of my power. Use it to fill the lava fissures!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Gift of the Earth to fill 8 Lava Fissures.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $r. Lord Magmathar's fire is now trapped, restrained within the earth once more.
